description: A SyntaxError is thrown when attempting to MonkeyPatching a function due to an invalid syntax. The code is attempting to add a new attribute to the function, but the syntax used is incorrect and thus the code is unable to be compiled.
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
AttributeError: 'function' object has no attribute 'new_attribute'
